title: Python for Beginners - 1 Month
sort_description: Start your programming journey with Python. Learn step by step from basics like variables, loops, functions, and file handling to build a strong foundation.

topics.title: Introduction to Python and Its Applications

title: HTML for Beginners - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn HTML step-by-step: structure pages, semantic tags, forms, media, and accessibility. Build real pages and small projects to practice.

chapters.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to the Web and HTML

topics.title: How the Web Works (Client, Server, Browser)
What is HTML? History and Role in Web Development
Setting Up Environment: Editors, Live Server
Anchor Tags, Relative vs Absolute URLs
Images: img tag, alt attribute, srcset basics

chapters.title: Chapter 4: Lists, Tables and Semantic Grouping

topics.title: Table Structure: table, thead, tbody, tr, td, th
Semantic Elements: section, article, nav, aside, footer
Form Elements: input, textarea, select, button

chapters.title: Chapter 6: Attributes, Metadata and Head Elements

topics.title: Importance of Accessibility (a11y) and semantic HTML
ARIA basics and using alt, role and aria-* attributes
Keyboard navigation and screen-reader friendly markup

chapters.title: Chapter 8: Responsive Basics & Mobile-first Concepts (HTML focused)

topics.title: Viewport meta and why mobile-first matters (conceptual)

chapters.title: Chapter 9: Practical Projects and Best Practices

topics.title: Project 2: Simple Multi-page Website (Home, About, Contact)
Code Organization, Comments, and Submission Guidelines

title: CSS & Responsive Design - 2 Month
sort_description: Master CSS from basics to responsive design. Learn Flexbox, Grid, animations, and create professional, responsive websites with real-world projects.

topics.title: CSS Units (px, em, rem, %, vh, vw)
Line Height, Letter Spacing, Word Spacing

title: Python for Intermediate - 1 Month
sort_description: Enhance your Python skills with intermediate-level concepts: OOP, modules, file handling, exception handling, and practical projects.

title: Python for Beginners to Intermediate - 2 Month
sort_description: Complete Python course from basics to intermediate. Learn Python fundamentals, OOP, file handling, modules, APIs, and create real-world projects.

title: Python for Advanced - 1 Month
sort_description: Master advanced Python concepts including decorators, context managers, generators, multithreading, database handling, APIs, and build real-world projects.

title: JavaScript for Beginners - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn JavaScript from scratch: variables, loops, functions, DOM basics, events, and small interactive projects.

topics.title: Setting up Environment: VSCode, Live Server
Conditional Statements: if, else if, else

title: JavaScript Intermediate - 1 Month
sort_description: Advance your JavaScript skills: ES6 features, DOM manipulation, events, fetch API, async programming, and practical projects.

title: JavaScript for Beginners to Intermediate - 2 Month
sort_description: Complete JavaScript course from basics to intermediate. Learn syntax, DOM manipulation, events, ES6 features, asynchronous programming, fetch API, and real-world projects.

topics.title: Array Methods: push, pop, shift, unshift
Advanced Array Methods: map, filter, reduce

title: JavaScript for Advanced - 1 Month
sort_description: Master advanced JavaScript concepts: ES6 classes, modules, async programming, fetch API, browser storage, debugging, and build real-world interactive projects.

topics.title: Weather App with Fetch API & Async/Await
Movie Search App with API Integration

title: Bootstrap for Beginners - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn Bootstrap from scratch: grid system, components, utilities, responsive design, and build real-world mini projects like landing pages and portfolio websites.

title: Bootstrap Advanced - 1 Month
sort_description: Master advanced Bootstrap: components, responsive design, JS plugins, and build real-world projects like dashboards and interactive landing pages.

title: React.js for Beginners - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn React.js from scratch: JSX, components, props, state, hooks, event handling, and build real-world mini projects like counter and to-do apps.

topics.title: Setting up React Environment (Vite/Create React App)

title: React.js Intermediate - 1 Month
sort_description: Advance your React.js skills: state management, props drilling, useEffect, forms, routing, API integration, and build real-world dynamic apps.

title: React.js Advanced - 1 Month
sort_description: Master advanced React.js: Context API, custom hooks, performance optimization, advanced routing, form libraries, and build large-scale interactive projects.

topics.title: Complete Admin Dashboard with API Integration

title: SQL for Beginners - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn SQL from scratch: database fundamentals, queries, joins, aggregate functions, keys, constraints, normalization, and hands-on mini projects.

title: SQL Advanced - 1 Month
sort_description: Advance your SQL skills: complex joins, subqueries, views, triggers, stored procedures, transactions, and build real-world database projects.

title: MS Word for Beginners - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn MS Word from scratch: interface, text & paragraph formatting, tables, images, page layout, shortcuts, tips, and hands-on mini projects like resumes and reports.

title: MS Word Advanced - 1 Month
sort_description: Master advanced MS Word skills: Mail Merge, Macros, advanced tables, templates, collaboration tools, advanced formatting, and hands-on projects.

title: Git & GitHub Basics - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn version control with Git and GitHub. Understand repositories, commits, branches, merges, pull requests, and collaboration workflows with real-world practice.

chapters.title: Getting Started with Git
topics: Basic Git Commands: git init, git status, git add, git commit

chapters.title: Mini Project
topics: Creating and Collaborating on a Sample Project

title: MS PowerPoint - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn to create professional presentations with Microsoft PowerPoint. Master slides, themes, animations, transitions, and presentation skills in 1 month.

title: MS Excel for Beginners - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn the basics of Microsoft Excel, including spreadsheets, formatting, simple formulas, and basic charts. Perfect for students and beginners.

title: MS Excel for Intermediate - 2 Months
sort_description: Upgrade your Excel skills with intermediate-level functions, conditional formatting, tables, pivot tables, and data handling techniques.

chapters.title: Conditional Formatting
topics: Data Bars, Color Scales, Icon Sets

chapters.title: Pivot Tables Basics
topics: Sorting and Filtering in Pivot Tables

title: MS Excel Advanced - 2 Months
sort_description: Master advanced Excel features including advanced formulas, nested functions, macros, dashboards, and automation techniques.

chapters.title: Capstone Project
topics: Apply Power Query, Pivot, and Macros

title: Power BI for Beginners - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn Power BI from scratch: data import, modeling, DAX basics, interactive visualizations, and dashboards.

chapters.title: Getting Started with Power BI Desktop
Data Import and Transformation
topics: Connecting to Excel, CSV, and Databases

chapters.title: Publishing and Sharing
topics: Publishing Reports to Power BI Service

title: Power BI Intermediate - 1 Month
sort_description: Master advanced Power BI skills: DAX functions, data modeling, row-level security, advanced visualizations, and real-world dashboards.

chapters.title: Review of Power BI Basics
topics: Quick recap of Import, Modeling, DAX

title: Power BI Advanced - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn enterprise-level Power BI: advanced DAX, security, performance optimization, deployment pipelines, paginated reports, AI visuals, and Azure integration.

chapters.title: Review of Intermediate Concepts
topics: Quick recap of DAX, Modeling, and RLS

chapters.title: Integration with Azure
topics: Power BI and Azure Machine Learning

title: Python for Data Analysis - Basics & Pandas - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn Python for data analysis with Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, and Pandas basics. Focus on data manipulation and exploratory data analysis.

title: Python for Data Analysis - Visualization & Statistics - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn data visualization in Python using Matplotlib & Seaborn, and apply basic statistical concepts for data analysis.

title: Python for Data Analysis - Advanced Pandas & ML Basics - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn advanced data manipulation in Pandas, and get introduced to machine learning concepts with scikit-learn.

title: Tableau for Beginners - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn Tableau from scratch: connect to data, create visualizations, dashboards, and interactive reports.

title: Django for Backend Development - 2 Months
sort_description: Learn backend development with Python Django using the latest version. Build web apps, REST APIs, implement authentication, and deploy projects.

title: ORM Concepts for Backend Development - 1 Month
sort_description: Master Django ORM and understand SQLAlchemy basics. Learn models, relationships, advanced queries, and database optimization for backend applications.

chapters.title: Introduction to ORM
topics: Overview of Django ORM and SQLAlchemy

title: REST API Development with Django - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn to build RESTful APIs using Django REST Framework. Master serializers, authentication, permissions, filtering, and deploy production-ready APIs.

chapters.title: Capstone Project
topics: Build REST API for E-commerce App

title: Authentication & Authorization for Backend - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn Django authentication and authorization techniques including JWT, OAuth2, session-based auth, and role-based access control for secure backend development.

chapters.title: JWT Authentication
topics: Integrating JWT with Django REST Framework

title: Deployment & Hosting for Backend - 1 Month
sort_description: Learn how to deploy Python Django backend applications to production using Heroku, AWS, or Digital Ocean. Manage databases, static files, security, and monitoring.

title: Advanced Backend Concepts - 1 Month
sort_description: Master advanced backend concepts including middleware, caching, logging, performance optimization, asynchronous tasks, security, and scalability in Django.
